  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103265</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103265</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reacting calcium carbonate and hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reagieren des Kalziumkarbonats und der 
Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction du carbonate de calcium et de l'acide 
chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reagindo o carbonato de cálcio e o ácido 
hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione il carbonato di calcio e dell'acido 
cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιδρόν ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου και υδροχλωρικό 
οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reaccionar el carbonato de calcio y el ácido 
hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when calcium carbonate reacts with hydrochloric acid, production of calcium chloride, carbon dioxide and water happens.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wenn Kalziumkarbonat 
mit Salzsäure reagiert, Produktion der Kalziumchlorverbindung, 
Kohlendioxyd und Wasser geschieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand le carbonate 
de calcium réagit avec de l'acide chlorhydrique, production de 
chlorure de calcium, anhydride carbonique et eau se produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando o carbonato 
de cálcio reage com o ácido hydrochloric, produção do cloreto de 
cálcio, dióxido de carbono e água acontece.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando il 
carbonato di calcio reagisce con acido cloridrico, produzione del 
cloruro di calcio, anidride carbonica ed acqua accade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν αντιδρά το 
ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου με το υδροχλωρικό οξύ, η παραγωγή του 
χλωριδίου ασβεστίου, του διοξειδίου του άνθρακα και του ύδατος 
συμβαίνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando el carbonato 
de calcio reacciona con el ácido hidroclórico, producción del 
cloruro de calcio, bióxido de carbono y agua sucede.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumkarbonat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumchlorverbindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergeudung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carbonate de calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chlorure de calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acide chlorhydrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carbonato de cálcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cloreto de cálcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ácido hydrochloric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desperdício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carbonato di calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cloruro di calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acido cloridrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spreco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χλωρίδιο ασβεστίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υδροχλωρικό οξύ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόβλητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carbonato de calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cloruro de calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ácido hidroclórico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">basura</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
